content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the division of assets of a deceased person with four heirs involved according to the law each heir is entitled to inherit 14 of the goods but adjustments were made in this case the widower inherits all of the goods while the sons and daughter of the deceased have waived their share of the inheritance the court decision was made based on the inheritance act specifically article 11 the estate includes a cash account and unpaid pension benefits the court determined the value of the estate to be 1000 eur and the court fee of 45 eur is to be paid by one of the heirs the court also reminded the heir to obtain a certificate of finality of the succession order and arrange for the property to be transcribed the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal which must be done within 15 days and submitted to the court with all necessary information if the appeal is filed by a proxy the proxy must be a qualified lawyer
